tool_description: Analyzes radiographic image quality by evaluating contrast, sharpness, noise levels, and positioning accuracy to ensure diagnostic standards.

image_file_path.description: Path to the radiographic image file

diagnostic_purpose.description: Intended diagnostic use of the image

error_messages: Image file not found: Cannot locate the specified image file.
Unsupported image format: Image format not supported for quality assessment.
Invalid assessment criteria: Must specify valid quality metrics.
Invalid quality threshold: Must be diagnostic, screening, or archive.
Corrupted image data: Image file appears to be damaged or incomplete.
usage: Provide image_file_path, assessment_criteria array, and diagnostic_purpose. Optionally set quality_threshold for evaluation standards.

noise_level.description: Quantified noise level in the image
